articles.title: Video: George Conway says new Mar-a-Lago filing has Trump 'dead to rights' - CNN Video
articles.description: Conservative attorney George Conway says the Department of Justice filing that contains new information about the FBI search at Mar-a-Lago has former President Donald Trump "dead to rights."

articles.title: World leaders mourn death of last Soviet leader Mikhail Gorbachev

articles.title: Takeaways from the historic Justice Department court filing on the Mar-a-Lago search
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump has pushed an "incomplete and inaccurate narrative" in his recent court filings about the Mar-a-Lago search, the Justice Department said in a historic court filing late Tuesday night.

articles.title: 'It's weird': Melania Trump's post-White House endeavor raises eyebrows - CNN Video
articles.description: While the former President Donald Trump has fumed about the FBI's search of Mar-a-Lago, former first lady Melania Trump has been quiet. CNN's Kate Bennett has new details of Mrs. Trump's reaction to the search.

articles.author: Rachel Ramirez, CNN
articles.title: First on CNN: The rise in extreme heat is taking a toll on our well-being. It's about to get worse
articles.description: A new study shows extreme heat is associated with a decrease in our sense of comfort and happiness.
articles.content:
(CNN)Extreme heat is on the rise around the world, and a new study shows it is taking a significant toll not just on our physical health but also our sense of well-being.

articles.author: CNN
articles.title: READ: The Justice Department's response to Trump's request for a special master
articles.description: The Justice Department on Tuesday responded to Judge Aileen Cannon of the Southern District of Florida regarding former President Donald Trump's request for a special master to oversee the FBI's review of materials seized in the Mar-a-Lago search.

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Common steroids used for asthma, allergies linked to brain decline, study finds
articles.description: Both oral and inhaled glucocorticoids used for asthma, allergies and other inflammatory conditions may be linked to decreased white matter, which limits connectivity between different regions of the brain, a new study finds.

articles.title: Intel agencies have been working with the FBI for months on assessing Mar-a-Lago documents
